name: Goo Farmer
description:
Goo Farmer is a Slime Rancher clone that I made in 5 days. You can watch the devlog here: 

Controls:

WASD - Move

Shift - Run

Space - Jump

Left Click - Suck

Right Click - Extract

Note: UI is only optimized for 1920x1080.

Join my discord if you need any help or wanna share feedback: https://discord.com/invite/qv8ECWuXxm
